name: Bug Tap Tap!
description:
Bug Tap Tap Is A Fun Simple Game For The Kids.
Defend Your Home From The Bugs And Advance Through The Levels As The Bug Army Gets Stronger With Each Level!

Features:
+ 20 Missions : Each Creating A Different Challenge
+ Many Bugs: Blue Green Yellow Pink Black Bugs All With Different Strategies!
+ Help The Lady Bugs Make It Back Home Without Accidently Tapping Them!
+ Beautiful Relaxing Music To Get Lost In

Google App has achievements and NO Ads!

Developed By satriogalih

Produced By Flaqko Studios

I am a small publisher who pays game developers to make games.
